passwordapplication.dao

Class WordlistDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • passwordapplication.dao.WordlistDAO

  • @Component
public class WordlistDAO
extends Object
    Wordlistdao is the class that handles the database operations for the Wordlist-table, which hosts the information about the wordlists added by the user. blacklist.
    Author:
    antti

      • readBlacklistStatus

        public Boolean readBlacklistStatus(Integer id)
                            throws SQLException
        Method for reading the blacklist-status of a wordlist.
        Parameters:
        id - - id (primary key) of the list to be read
        Returns:
        Boolean object, that corresponds to blacklist-status.
        Throws:
        SQLException

      • deleteList

        public void deleteList(Integer list_id)
        Method to delete Wordlist from database. Please note, that this method only deletes the information of the list, and not the words on that list.
        Parameters:
        list_id - - id (primary key) of the list to be delete.
